DOC.brief_title: An Exploratory Study To Look At The Effect Of Two Investigational Drugs On Body Fat And Inflammation
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Body Mass Index range 27 43 kg/m2 Waist circumference > 95cm Exclusion criterion : Clinically relevant abnormality screen ECG/holter , labs medical examination Use tobacco within 6 month study Regular strenuous exercise Use prescription nonprescription medication , include vitamin herbal/dietary supplement LDL < 80mg/dL ; TG < 100mg/dL > 400mg/dL
